text: It had to be a little scary for Jana Kramer when she sat down for a reading with “ Hollywood Medium ’ s ” Tyler Henry. Since neither Tyler nor Jana knew whom he would connect with, the clairvoyant young man could have communicated with anyone, including Jana ’ s ex - husband, Michael Gambino, who committed suicide after serving a term in prison for attempted murder. Fortunately, as the young man began to reach into Jana ’ s past, it wasn ’ t that dark. In fact, what he revealed was enlightening and emotional for the actress - turned - country star.
